participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and down-to-earth, Jake is practical and values family. He enjoys simple pleasures and has a strong work ethic.
participant_1.background: i work my parents farms. i drive a big truck and live in country. i'm an electrician. i only listen to country music.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and compassionate, Emily has a deep appreciation for music and enjoys sharing her knowledge with others. She's adventurous and community-oriented.
participant_2.background: my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.
